casebody.data:
Ephraim B. Demarest, Appellant v. Justus J. Smith, Respondent. Decided March 6, 1888. Appeal from judgment. William C. Davies, for appellant. Theodore Dingeldein, for respondent.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Opinion by Dugro, J.

Judgment affirmed without costs if the defendants will consent to its reduction so as to be for $589.25; otherwise judgment reversed and a new trial ordered, with costs to abide the event.
